string.value: Hey you! Stay away. You're not part of this Hunt. It is too dangerous!
{0} has started a new Hunt! Join the Hunt to help stop the beasts... Or become one yourself!
A new hunt has been started by {0}! Hit the button to get hunted!
{0} seems to have a bad case of Paleblood. {0}'s only hope lies in the cursed city of Yharnam. Use the magic button to take part on the hunt!
{0} brings bad omens! Use the button to enter the blood moon's hunt!
Embrace your beasthood! Join the hunt with {0}.
{0} has entered the carriage to the Cainhurst castle! Join now!
{0} points out that the great blood moon appeared! Use the button to hunt down the most terrible beasts!
Poor you... The other hunters left you behind.\nUse /nextgame so this doesn't happen again.
You've already joined the hunt!
The hunt begins in 1 minute. Press the button to take part on it.
{0} seconds left to join the hunt.\n**WARNING**\nThis mod is based on a videogame -- __Bloodborne__ by From Software.
The few hunters tried to enter Yharnam to fight the beasts, but they weren't strong enough.\nNo hunt for you this time!

The hunt is starting, please wait while the hunters choose their weapons.
**WARNING:**
This mod is based on a videogame -- __Bloodborne__ by From Software.
If you never played the game or if you aren't familiarized with it, you may be a little lost. It's okay to ask for help!

The hunt is starting, please wait while the hunters choose their weapons.
**WARNING:**
This mod is based on a videogame -- __Bloodborne__ by From Software.
The texts and events are based on the game's lore, so you may get a little lost. Sorry about that!
{0} is banned for attempting to commune with a Great One! (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to join
Sorry, there are too many hunters! Better luck next time.
{0} has joined the hunt. {1} hunters, {2} minimum, {3} max.

Oh,yes... Paleblood. Heh...
{0}, you've come to the right place. Yharnam is the home of blood ministration. You need only unravel its mystery.
But where's an outsider like yourself to begin? First, you'll need a contract. PM {1} and start me.
 You may not join the hunt until you do.
You can't run away, the great Moon Presence has trapped you inside Yharnam! Live the rest of your days as a mute messenger.
{0} has tried to flee, but has been caught! The hunt has no use for cowards, {0} will be punished with death.
{0} hunters remain.
Hey I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be hunting.
I can't find a hunter by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to kill {1}.
{0} has voted to hunt {1}.
{0} has not voted for 2 nights in a row. The great Moon Presence appeared and devoured {0}'s soul. {1}
Accept your beasthood. You are now a ferocious beast, and will kill all the hunters!
Choice accepted.
Okay.
As you wish.
Sure.
I saw that coming.
Are you sure?
I know, I know.
Yes.
Of course.
Right.
Clever move.
Will do.
Roger.
huh?
Nice.
Why not?
Don't spam me, I'm going.
*flies away*
\nThe doll is {0}.
{0} was the doll. As his/her newer "version", you step up to become the new doll, and will help guide the hunters.
Since {1} died, you give life to {0}, your new Doll. {0} has now stepped up to fill {1}'s place.
You see {0} is {1}!
Who do you want to hunt?
Who do you want to do research on?
Who do you want to shoot? {0} shots remain.
Who do you want to visit?
Who do you want to see?
Who do you want to aid?
Who do you want to kill?
Who will you hunt down?
Who is your role model?
Who do you want to corrupt?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are the Afflicted Beggar (😾). You still a normal person for now, but if the beasts choose to kill you, you will become a beast yourself.

You are a Healing Church scholar (🕵). During the day, you may choose a player to do research on, and it will reveal their role. However - in doing so, your role could be revealed to the beasts! (40% chance)

You are Sister Adella (🍻). You actually don't do anything more than spen your days and nights praying. But if the beasts find you, you will lock up the church doors. You will die, but the beasts will remain trapped inside for the next night.
You are the Good Hunter (👼). Each night, you will choose a player to aide. However, if you choose a beast, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You are Djura, the retired hunter(🔫). You have two bullets on your blunderbuss. During the day, you may choose to shoot another player. Everyone will hear it, and know your role.

You are the Arianna, the woman of the night (💋). During the night, you may choose to visit another player (you know, to... "relax" from the hunt).\nHowever--if you visit a beast, or visit someone killed by them, you will also die. If you do go to visit though, and the beasts tries to kill you at your home, you will survive (you weren't home, after all).

You are Father Gascogne (🖕). Someday, you'll lose yourself to the blood lust and tur yourself into a beast. That will only happen if all the other beasts die, though. If the Doll looks to you, you may or may not be identified as a beast.
(🐺) YOU ARE A BEAST! Each night you can choose to kill someone.
You are the Plain Doll (👳). Each night, you may choose a player to 'see', and reveal their role to you.
You are a hunter (👱)! Don't underestimate yourself. You don't have any special powers, but you can help your fellow hunters. Kill all the beasts, and hope you can beat this nightmare.
You are Mergo (👺). If you get hunted, you win automatically! Why?\nYou don't know, you're just a newborn baby. Go back to sleep, your nurse is taking good care of you. =)
You are the Vengeful Hunter (👶)! Pick a player to be your close friend. If they die, you will become a beast and seek revenge!
You are the Doll Maker (👁). Since you create and gives them life, you know who the real doll is.
You are a brand new Doll (🙇). If the (real) Doll dies, you will take their place as the Doll.

You are a corrupted hunter (👤). Your lust for the blood and for the hunt transformed you into a dangerous enemy. It is your goal to corrupt all other hunters (except Beasts or Iosefka) to your group of crazed hunters. You'll win the game if at the end of it, all living players are corrupted.

You are Eileen, the Crow (💂). You are a member of a covenant that hunts down hunters that begin to go insane from bloodlust. If they try to corrupt you, you will kill their most recent member in the fight!
Dusk draws near, and the hunters gather to decide their next target...\nEveryone now has {0} seconds to vote!
The night and its terrors were long, and you have a brief glimpse of sun. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations.
Another morning comes. You feel relieved, but don't forget you have {0} until the night comes.
Night has fallen, and the hunters prepare for another bloody night. Night players: you have {0} seconds to use your actions!

The hunters decide to hunt {0}!\n{0} stands up and draw their weapons, ready to defend themselves. The fight is dirty, bloody and hard, but in the end... {0} didn't resist. Their true nature is revealed: {1}
A decision has been made. Everyone has voted, and the death penalty comes to {0}! Fighting is pointless, but {0} is too proud to be murdered by a mob. They throw themselves into the poison lake. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision, you postpone the hunt until a consensus is reached. You all feel useless.
You cowards, no one wants to face the hunt! The beasts will be glad.
The hunters gather, but {0} isn't among them.\nThey quickly enter the Healing Church College, and the first thing they see is {0}'s head on a corner. {0}(🕵) died.
As everyone gathers, they notice a shapeless bunch of meat right beside a strange bell. The victim's face is unrecognizable, but the ragged robes shows who the victim is: {0}, the Good Hunter.
As the hunters gather, they find pieces of a cannon strewn about... a saw cleaver... then legs... then the body of {0}. At least, their upper body. You have lost Djura.
{0} chose the wrong moment to pray by the gravestone. The beasts saw The Plain Doll and destroyed it. Who's going to pray for the Hunters now?
The beasts know no love. {0} chose the wrong moment to pray by the gravestone. Your Doll has been destroyed.
Strange sounds come from inside the church! It seems that {0} is preventing the beasts from leaving. It's a shame that she'll die in the process. At least, the beasts won't kill anyone next night.
The Old Yorkshop is burning! {0} is sitting on a corner, completely torn apart. The Abandoned Doll is dead, just like her fake sights.
There is a fight somewhere. Everyone follows them, hoping to get there in time, but they fail... When you get there, you see {0} smashed into a pulp, murdered by beasts.\n{1}
{0} went alone into the woods, searching for bloodstones. They found the beasts instead! The only thing left after the fight are the remains of {0}.\n{1}

{0}'s behaviour is erratic and strange. No doubt, they are corrupted!
No one seems to know what to do, when suddenly you see a blur made of black feathers.
Eileen, the Crow shows up, Mercy Blades ready. Eileen orders everyone to stand down, and despite her blades' name, she is completely merciless.
In a matter of minutes, only Eileen is alive. All covered in blood, she tells everyone that the danger has passed, and carries {0}'s body away. {0}, a corrupted hunter, is now dead.

There's something off about {0}. Eileen, the Crow arrives, and this can only mean one thig: {0} is a Corrupted Hunter!\nEileen cuts off {0}'s head with a swift move of her Mercy blades.\nThe warning is clear: Do not become a corrupted Hunter.
No one died last night. Not a single hunter or beast. Is this a dream?
Morning comes, no new bodies. What happened last night?
It is night, and suddenly the beasts show up! As you were the Afflicted Beggar, something grows inside you. You have now become a beast!
Your fellow beasts are: {0}
You try to kill {0}, but he/she were the Afflicted Beggar 😾! You welcome your new teammate.
Suddenly, wild beasts appear! You draw your Kirkhammer and get ready for a fight, but your strength isn't enough. The beasts kill you and bathe in your blood. Sweet dreams.
Oh no! {0} was the Sister Adella (insert Drunk emoji here)! She closed the church doors and now you can't seem to find a way out. At least you killed her for the trouble.

You tried to help a beast! Unfortunately, this one was faster __and__ stronger than you. As you try to reach the bell and teleport back, something grabs your arm. The last thing you remember are sharp teeth.
You head down to were {0} is, knowing that they're in trouble. You make it just in time to save {0}'s life and repel the beasts. Congratulations! You two share a blood vial to celebrate.
{0} was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything. Since you are there, you spend the rest of the night training your skills together.
You went to guard {0}, but they weren't anywhere to be found! That certainly is strange...

Suddenly, wild beasts appear! You draw your Kirkhammer and get ready for a fight, but your strength isn't enough. Just when you're sure you're gonna die, a Good Hunter shows up! He/she helps you to repel the beasts, and you survive to live another day.\nThat was close!
Arianna chose the wrong night to stay home. {0} has been killed by the beasts! Adella always said that one day, God's punishment would come. No more fun nights for the hunters.
You all head down to kill {0}, but she wasn't home! Better luck next time.
You slip into {0}'s house for a little fun, only to find out that they are a beast.\n Adella always told you that punishment would come, and now is the time. You are dead.
{0} slipped into the wrong house last night! {0}'s slutty remains are found on the streets, with no clothes on. That's sad, no more Arianna's blood for you.

{0} slips into {1}'s house, ready to have a little fun to ease off the stress of the hunt. Instead, {0} finds a {1} fighting the beasts. Her knife isn't as sharp as beast claws, and in less than a second, {0} is dead.
You see {0} is not a beast, as you got fucked good and hard all night long! You left early, leaving behind an ampoule of your blood as a gift.

It was a bit dark, so you couldn't see well enough, but in the middle of the night Arianna shows up and kisses you. You can't resist, and you too share a happy and warm night. She goes away and leaves behind an ampoule of her blood, which you keep in a pocket close to your heart.
{0} seems too interested in beasts! {0} must be the one that has been attending to the College! You can't afford to have someone knowing you're a beast, can you?
Your studies has shown you that {0} is {1}.
Looks like {0} didn't like the night! {0} shoots {1}, claiming to be sexually harassed. {1} is dead.
Suddenly, a shot rings out. The hunters turns to see {0} standing over {1}'s body, smoke coming out of the cannon, blood splattered everywhere. {2}
No hunter could resist your power, there is no hope for Yharnam. The Beast won!
The beasts gather around the few hunters, claws ready. It is quick, it is bloody and it is ugly. After the fight, the beasts feed on the hunters corpses. The beasts have won!
**NIGHTMARE SLAIN**\n\nThe hunters can now rest, the beasts have been beaten.
As you hunt down Mergo, he cries out loud. His nurse shows up to defend him! The fight is bloody, and you all come out defeated. You are now lost in Mergo's Nightmare.\nFOREVER.
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to corrupt {1}
{0} was sent to corrupt {1}... You sent {0} to corrupt Eileen, the Crow?! {0} is dead, what have you done?!
{0} came to your house last night, ready to corrupt you... Your Mercy Blades were thirsty anyway...\n A corrupted hunter is dead. {1} remain!
The covenant of Corrupter Hunters reached you! You are now corrupt, drunk from your bloodlust. Every other night, you will have a chance to corrupt another player.
Corrupted ones: {0}
{0} has been corrupted!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and corrupt {1}... But {0} was anywhere to be found!
All the beasts have died, and the only hunters have been corrupted! No one is now between you and the killing!
Who could have known that Blood is so sweet? Congratulations, Corrupted hunters!
You went to hunt down {0}, but only found a body! {0} is dead, and you wasted your night.

{0} shows sings of clear madness. {0} lost themselves to the blood lust. Telling everyone else to stand down, you fight the crazed hunter and end their life. Everybody seems shocked while you drag {0}'s body away.
You go after {0}, but there is no strange behaviour. You follow {0} from some distance, but quickly gives up. {0} hasn't been corrupted....\nFor now.
{0}'s friend just died! In their rage and lust for revenge, they have become a blood-starved beast!
{0} has died! In your rage, you have become a beast! You now will seek revenge alongside your new teammates: {1}
a Hunter 👱
Sister Adella 🍻
Arianna, woman of the night 💋
the Plain Doll 👳
Father Gascogne 🖕
the Good Hunter 👼
a Healing Church Scholar 🕵
a Beast 🐺
the Afflicted Beggar 😾
Djura, the Retired Hunter 🔫
Mergo 👺
the Abandoned Doll 🃏
the Vengeful Hunter 👶
the Doll Maker 👁
the Recent-made Doll 🙇
a Corrupted Hunter 👤
Eileen, the Crow 💂
had his/her soul eaten.
💀 Dead
💀 Dead (how I wanted to be)
💀 ded
🙂 Alive
🙂 Alive and well
- Still breathing 🙂
Players Alive
a Messenger 👷
You are a Messenger (👷). If there are any other messengers, you will know who they are. Otherwise, you will just aid the hunters.
As everyone gathers, they find the body of {0} shoved into a gravestone. You all lost a messenger!
The messengers are: {0}
Your newest hunter heads over to where {0} is, only to find {0}'s remains. Someone got there first! You quickly retreat, better safe than sorry.

The beasts head to where {0} is located. The fight seems easy, you know that {0}'s strength isn't enough to stop you.\n{0} is almost dead, and the victory is certain, but a hunter suddenly shows up. They help {0}, and they manage to fight you off. {0} survived. For now.

You send {0} to try to corrupt {1}. {1}'s resolve is too powerful, and you aren't able do corrupt them. As you retreat, {1} says that you should never come again.\nYou doubt that they'll have the mental strength to ignore the lust for blood.
@{1}, a hunter with the name {0} has already joined. Please change your name to join.
You slipped into {0}'s house for a bit of fun... It wasn't that bad, but you notice something strange in {0}'s eyes. Were those the feared signs of corruption?
was
Everyone gathers, and notices that {0} is not around... After some search, they find the remains of {0}.
As the hunters gather for the hunt they find the remains of {0}, torn apart in the middle of the street.
Odd.... {0} didn't show up to greet the hunters. What happened?
You can't leave Yharnam in the middle of a hunt! The city seems to have no way out. Good luck on finding one, coward!
is dead
{0} added to the Great Ones list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a hunt! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple hunts... Too much blood will make you drunk and corrupted! I'll cancel any other hunts.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}

Sorry, I'm about to challenge the great Moon Presence of Maintenance, you can't start a hunt right now, it is too dangerous!.\nWaiting on {0} to end to end...\nGo to @greywolfdev for more information.
Sorry, max concurrent hunts has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no hunt going on. Start a new hunt with /startgame or start a **chaotic** hunt with /startchaos
Only a Great One can run this command.
Only a **REAL NOOB** can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already a Great One!
{0} is not a Great One!
{0} removed from Great Ones list.
Language set to {0}
No Dolls!
Time's up!
Too slow.
Those slow reflexes will kill you someday.

You are the Chapel Dweller (🏹). You will choose two hunters to defend your chapel. If one dies, the other will immediately seek revenge, and die in the process. If they survive together at the end, they will win.

You are a Doppelgänger (🎭). Legend has it that your ancestors were metamorphs, and could choose any form they wanted. You have inherited some of their capacities. No one knows about you, so you can hunt safely for now. Choose a player, when that player dies, you will take on their role.

You Gherman, the First Hunter (🎯). You are extremely skilled and don't go anywhere without your scythe. If you get hunted and die, you will take someone with you. If the beasts try to kill you, you have a chance to randomly kill one of them.
You are Iosefka (🔪). Actually, you're the EVIL Iosefka. Each night, you can chose a player to experiment on, killing them in the process. You can experiment on ANYONE.
You have been chosen to guard the Oedon Chapel. Your companion is {0}. If one of you dies, the other one will seek revenge, and die in the process. If one of you wins, the other one wins too.
The hunters chose to hunt you! This is your last chance, join the hunt and kill somebody, quickly!
Quickly! You are being hunted! Pick someone to kill before your own death.
They want to kill you! You throw your scythe and hit.......
"Tonight, Gherman joins the hunt", {0} says, and stands up from the wheelchair. Fortunately, he was too slow. A shot rings out, and {0} sits back, dead.

"Tonight, Gherman joins the hunt", {0} says, and stands up from the wheelchair. {0} whips out their scythe and looks at the crowd... and cannot make a decision on who to kill. A shot rings out, and {0} drops the scythe. "The night, and the dream were long..." {0} says, just before vanishing.

"Tonight, Gherman joins the hunt", {0} says, and stands up from the wheelchair. A shot rings out, but {0} keeps coming. The closes person is {1}, and they can't hold Gherman's power! In a clean and single movement, {0} waves his/her scythe. {1}'s head flies away, while {0} laughs. They're both dead, but {2}
You've been murdered! In your last moments you join the hunt, and have the chance to chop someone's head off... make it quick!

"Tonight, Gherman joins the hunt", {0} says, and stands up from the wheelchair. Fortunately, he was too slow. A shot rings out, and {0} sits back, dead. The blow to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for their scythe, as they lay in a pool of blood...
"The night, and the dream were long..." {0} says, and opens their arms, thankfully accepting their fate.
Dying, {0} falls to the ground.... but not without sending their scyte flying upon {1}, who was too slow. {1}'s head is separated from their body, and both fall dead. {2}
The beasts tried to attack Gherman night, but the he was too strong! Gherman dies, but he manages to kill {0} before his final breath. {0} was a beast, and is dead now.
The beast tried to attack Gherman last night, but he was too strong! {0}, the last known beast, is now dead!
The beast headed to Iosefka's Clinic, believing they would prevail. But Iosefka's __Augur of Ebrietas__ was too powerful! {0} is now dead from Iosefka's experiments.

It seemed a normal hunting night, but you are wrong. There were someone hunted down by Iosefka instead! {0} isn't where they should be. Instead, the hunters find only a shattered blood vial... {0} is dead from Iosefka's experiments. {1}

You tried to hunt {0} for your experiments, but upon arriving, you found yourself dealing with two hunters instead! The Good Hunter helps {0} to defeat you, and you run for your life, hoping to catch {0} off-guard someday.
The crazed hunters sends {0} to try to corrupt {1}, but {0}'s head comes flying out of the window instead! Someone killed {0}.

You tried to Iosefka with her experiments, but you discovered too late that she is actually the EVIL Iosefka! Well, she manages to tangle you with her Threaded Cane, and tear you apart, limb by limb. As you get experimented on ALIVE, you pray for this nightmare to end soon. As you die, the last thing you listen to is her voice...\n"Oh, how exciting! I've never worked on a hunter before...".

You slip into {0}'s house, and start having a little fun. All seems great until {0} pulls out a surgeon knife and slits your throat! You stumble on the ground while Iosefka walks toward you, laughing like a maniac. The last thing you hear before death embraces you, are footsteps...
The can't seem to find {0} anywhere. Actually, no one will ever hear from {0} again. Iosefka has made another victim with her experiments.
The doppelganger {0} has now become a messenger, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a messenger. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The doppelganger {0} has now become a crazed blood-drunk hunter, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a lustful hunter. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The doppelganger {0} has now become a beast, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a beast. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
Iosefka step out of her clinic, and with a grin, she realizes that no one will be between her and her experiments anymore. Yharnam is now hers to rule.
Who do you want to experiment on(KILL :P) tonight?

With {0}'s dying breath, {1} rushes over to help their fellow Chapel protector. But heart is the enemy of wisdom, and {1} can't fight properly. Actually, the only thing that {1} can do is to get themselves killed. Sad, but no much. {2}
Who do you want to become if they die?
Who do you want your protectors to be? Choose the first player
Who do you want your protectors to be? Choose the second player
Gherman, the First Hunter 🎯
Oedon Chapel Dweller 🏹
Iosefka 🔪
the Doppelgänger 🎭
You have become the Vengeful Hunter, a __wild child__ as some say. Your close friend is {0}
There is nothing better than a good partner in hunts! Both the Chapel Protectors won against all odds, and accomplished their mission. Another day rises in Yharnam, but they have no more nightmares.
In the middle of the town square, everyone finds the body of {0}. Their head is found a couple of meters away. Looks like they tried to sneak up on Gherman! {1}

A hunter shows up in front of you. Erratic behaviour and strange-looking eyes don't leave room for mistakes, it's a crazed and blood-drunk hunter!\nYou have no interest in being corrupted, so you draw your Ludwig's Holy Blade and starts fighting the figure.\nWhen the crazed hunter realizes how strong you are, they run away. You still tries one last shot, but misses. As they get away, you shout - telling them to never come back.
You are already on the wait list for {0}

You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next hunt is starting.
While waiting, why not browse the store? https://teespring.com/stores/werewolf-for-telegram 

**WARNING**: This group might be using the __Bloodborne__ lang pack. Blame igorfeiden for this.
A new hunt is starting in {0}

Morning comes, and the remaining two hunters walk out to the town square.\n{0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on their face, pulls out a surgeon knife and repeating pistol, and runs toward {1}. {1} was not ready for this and try to resist, sidestepping and shooting.\n{0} uses her Augur of Ebrietas and hit {1}, who stumbles. Then, {0} uses A Call Beyond. The magic hits {1}, already weak. {1} died quickly, almost painlessly.
Another hunt ends on Yharnam. But this one has no winner. You have all been slain and failed...\nmiserably.\nMay all of you find your worth in the waking world.

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into Yharnam.
{0} pulls out their surgeon knife, and jumps at {1}.
{1} pulls out a huge scythe, and swings it to defend themselves. {0} throws their knife and misses, but manages to dodge {1}'s hits. {1} is too quick, and jumps at {0}, and with a swift move, stabs {0} in the stomach.
{0} holds {1}'s hands close to themselves, and with the other free hand, call one last time to Ebrietas. The tentacles pierce {1}'s head, and they die instantly. {0} managed to kill the First and Last hunter, but to what price? At least, {0} dies with a smile.
But both are dead, there is no winner. May you find rest on your endless dream....
You failed to make a choice, so the great Moon Presence has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost

The great Moon Presence sees all, listens to all, and judges all. Player {0} didn't vote in the last two hunts, and the Moon Presence judges it as a terrible lack of respect. So it descends and eats {0}'s soul, and {0} is now dead. {0} did it {1} times in the past 24 hours.
Your role is simple - hunt. Each day, you will have a chance to hunt down someone.

You are the Plain Doll. In this role, each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the Doll, the beasts will try to kill you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to deceive your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill! Note:if you attack Adella, you will become locked into the church, and will be unable to attack the next night as you are trapped inside! If you attack the Afflicted Beggar, they will become a Beast like yourself! KILL THEM ALL!

As the Arianna, women of Pleasure (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the beast, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a beast, you will be killed. If you visit the player the beasts have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the beasts choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home).
You are Adella! If the beasts try to kill you, you will trap them inside the church before dying. At least they will be trapped there and you will prevent them from attack in the next night.
As the Afflicted Beggar, you are a normal hunter... until the beasts kill you. Once they do, you will become a beast as well! Free to hunt in the night.....

You are a traitorous bastard Father Gascogne is. If you survive long enough for all the beasts to die, you will become a werewolf blood-starved beast, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Good Hunter! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over and aid. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a beast, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.

You are a simple scholar from the Healing Church College. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate/research on another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the beasts will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the Retired Hunter Djura, you are given quicksilver bullets enough for only two shots. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know who you are! Be careful though, you only have 2 shots!
The Mergo's goal is simple: Get Lynched. If Mergo gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
The Abandoned Doll is told they are the real Plain Doll.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a corrupted hunter, it is your goal to corrupt all other players (except beasts) to your covenant. If at the end of the game, all living players are corrupted - the covenant wins!

You are Eileen, the Crow! Your job is to hunt down the corrupted hunters! If the hunters tries to corrupt you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to hunt - if they are from the covenant, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your Close Friend. If they die, you become a beast and seek revenge!
For now, you are just a recent-made Doll, disguised as a normal hunter. However, if the Doll dies, you will become the new Plain Doll!
Since you make the dolls, you know who the real one is.
A messenger's job is simple - they automatically know who the other messengers are. You should help the hunters!

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. \nNote: If the player was corrupted, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Vengeful Hunter and their role model died, you will become a beast. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. \nThe corrupted hunters cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: fellow Chapel Protector)

You are the Chapel Dweller. You will choose two hunters to defend your chapel. If one dies, the other will immediately seek revenge, and die in the process. If they survive together at the end, they will win.\n TL;DR if at least one of the protectors was on the winning team, they both win together.

You are Gherman, the First Hunter. As the First Hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as you are crazy to join the hunt. If the beasts attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to decapitate someone as you die.\nNote: For beast attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one beast, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the beast (and survive). For each additional beast, add 20% (2 beasts = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple beasts, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed.\nIf the covenant of corrupteds tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

You are Iosefka. Actually, you're the EVIL Iosefka. Each night, you can chose a player to experiment on, killing them in the process. You can experiment on ANYONE. I mean, A N Y O N E. KILL THEM ALL!\nNOTE: If the beasts try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.

Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people, while hunting them down! Maybe he's been messing with werewolves and beasts too long....Messing with beasts and werewolves is a very bad idea. (especially with wuffs!)

You have successfully joined the game in {0}
Time to send ping message: {0}
You are the Old Hunter (🎖). Your vote during the hunting will count twice, once you have revealed yourself. You are on the hunters team!

You are secretly the Annalise, the Queen of Vilebloods (👑). If they try to hunt you, they will realize their error, and no one will be lynched. They will all bow before you instead. Long live the Vilebloods!
You are a Blind Hunter (🤕): You’ll try to hunt, but there is a 50% chance you’ll vote for someone else other than you intended instead. You’re still on the hunters team though.

You are the Brain Sucker (🔮), allying yourself with the beasts. At night you will shove your giant tentacle into someone's brain. You won't die, however. Your Insight sucking grants thema short amnesia, and they will never remember your visit! You win only if the beasts win. Enjoy sucking their minds! You will know if they are a beast or the Plain Doll.

You are Valtr, Master of __The__ League (⚒). You have a small covenant of hunters, big enough to guard the city and prevent the beasts from attacking for ONE night. During the day, you can choose to call your covenant. Other than that, you are just a normal hunter.

You are The One Reborn (⚡️); one of the sources of the scourge of the beasts. To you were given the power that turns people into vicious beasts.\nEach night, you will choose a hunter to attack and kill, but as long as you are alive, your victim has a 20% chance of turning into a beast.

You are the Winter Lantern (🐶), and brings nothing less than **TOTAL FRENZY**. Like other beasts, you will choose a villager to attack and kill every night. If you happen to be killed, a mass frenzy will begin, and the beasts will be able to kill two hunters the next night. You’ll still be dead though.

As the hunters head to hunt {0}, they say "Stop now! Bow before your queen".\nAnnalise shows her true nature, and you can't help but feel a deep respect for the ancient Vilebloods. You shall not hunt tonight.

You visit {0}'s brain and mind. They can't remember what happened, but you made a quite good snack (of course, you didn't kill anyone, just took their sanity). They are not a beast or the Plain Doll however...

{0}, the Old Hunter steps forward and gathers all the other hunters around them.\n{0} explains old combat strategies and techniques, and as his respect and reputation among the hunters increases, {0}'s votes for hunting will count twice from now on.
Click "Reveal" whenever you are ready to reveal yourself as the Old Hunter
Reveal
The League members are impatient. They want to hunt down the beasts, but you ask them to stay calm, the time is yet to come.

There is some noise down the street, close to the lamp!
You see {0} leading a small group of hunters. They present themselves as members of The League, a hunters covenant. They say they are willing to help.
They will patrol Yharnam streets tonight, and will help the hunters.
Since there are too many people in town, it is too dangerous for the beasts to attack someone.
the Old Hunter 🎖
Annalise, the Queen of Vilebloods 👑
the Brain Sucker 🔮
the Blind Hunter 🤕
Valtr, Master of the League ⚒
the One Reborn ⚡️
the Winter Lantern 🐶

As the beasts attack {0}, {1} stops everyone. {1} feels something, the scourge is growing and strong inside {0}.\nThere is no need for proof, the beasts retreat as {0} is left alone, almost dead. {0} will suffer for only a day, and will be transformed into a beast next night.

The beasts show up, and you're not ready. You try to fight, when something strange happens. One of the beasts seems to look directly into your eyes. You feel something strange growing inside you, and even being left almost dead, you begin to feel thirst for blood...\nToday, you suffer. Tomorrow, you kill as a new beast.

As another hunt begins, you can't help but want more and more blood. You run away from your partners and hide, as a fire begins to burn inside you.
You look at the moon for the last time as a human, and your body begins to change! Not only your body but your mind are now different.
You only see blood.
You only want blood.
As the Old Hunter 🎖, your voting counts twice. Reveal yourself wisely, as the beasts will probably target you after your reveal.

Annalise is the ghostly queen of the Vilebloods, a once powerful and proud covenant. Now you're just a shadow of your former self, but you must be respected, as a queen. If the hunters try to hunt you, you will reveal yourself as a queen, and survive. However, if they insist on hunting you... Well, you might end up dying.

The Brain Sucker will help the beasts in order to find the Plain Doll. They will dwell into someone's brain and suck Insight, but they won't know who/what that player is. It will only be revealed if the 'sucked' player is a beast or the Doll.

You are the blind hunter. After all those hunts, a beast pierced your eyes, and you can't see properly. For this reason, you can't choose your targets properly, and is too proud to leave the hunt. When voting, you may get confused and vote for someone different than you originally intended. (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are Valtr, Master of the League. You have a small covenant of hunters, big enough to guard the city and prevent the beasts from attacking for ONE night. During the day, you can choose to call your covenant. Other than that, you are just a normal hunter.

You are The One Reborn; one of the sources of the scourge of the beasts. To you were given the power that turns people into vicious beasts. Each night, you will choose a hunter to attack and kill, but as long as you are alive, your victim has a 20% chance of turning into a beast.

You are the Winter Lantern, and brings nothing less than TOTAL FRENZY. Like other beasts, you will choose a villager to attack and kill every night. If you happen to be killed, a mass frenzy will begin, and the beasts will be able to kill two hunters the next night. You’ll still be dead though.
{0} has died, and you transform into the One Reborn. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
{0} has died, and you transform into a Winter Lantern. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}

The covenant sends {0} to try to corrupt {1}, but instead... Well...\nLet's say that no one will ever hear again about {0}.\n{0} has been eaten by the beasts.

{0} slipped into the wrong house last night. Seems like {1} was being experimented on by Iosefka! {0}'s slutty remains will never be found. Iosefka has now a new test subject. That's sad, no more Arianna's blood for you.
As the hunters gather, the Doll Maker cries in a corner. You all clearly see that his brand new Doll is now completely destroyed, beyond repair. Poor {0}. If they even had a chance to see anything...

There is a faint trail of blood leading to a house nearby. As the hunters investigate, they find a whole bunch of celestial emissaries.\nValtr and his League of hunters were entirely murdered and experimented on by Iosefka! The hunters quickly dispatch from all of them, but the strongest is {0}. Now with {0} dead, the hunters know that no help will come...

As the hunters gather, {0} isn't among them. Of course not! Iosefka has made another victim. But that's not all. In front of the Church is {0}'s head in a spike. The eyes leave no doubt that {0} was a crazed and corrupted hunter! Seems like Iosefka does a better job than Eileen...

No one seems to mind that {0}, the Chapel Dweller, is missing. A strange being that Iosefka surely learned a lot about! No body is found. No blood. No sound made during the night. Iosefka passed even through the Church Guardians.

Shouts coming from inside the church! All hunters go there immediately, fearing for the worse.\nSadly, they weren't fast enough. {0} a.k.a. Sister Adella is found crawling to the altar, while a pool of blood quickly spreads through the floor. When {0} stops moving, the hunters bury their Sister behind the church. {0} is dead, but at least won't be experimented on.
{0} would normally have managed to help fight off the threats. Not this time, because {0} has proven useless. That's why your Good Hunter is now dead.

The hunters hear a loud shot. Then a loud cry.\nThen, silence.\nAs everybody hurries over to where {0} was, they already know what happened... {0} is now dead, and Iosefka ran away before you could catch her... No one listened to {0}'s last words.

As the hunters search {0} to look for advice, no one seem to find the Old Hunter!\nWell, you should have known better... Iosefka has another test subject now. At least, {0} didn't die without a fight.

Annalise found herself dealing with someone disrespectful. She couldn't tolerate this, and tried to use her magic to kill the unwanted guest. Sadly, {0} was visited by Iosefka, and is now dead.\nLook! Iosefka left something... There's a chunk of Queenly Flesh over the chair. The hunters hold on tho that, hoping to find the Altar of Despair soon...

No one seems to have seen {0}. When looking for them, the hunters find nothing.\nIn the place that the Doll usually was, the hunters find a letter from Iosefka, stating that you have lost your guidance.
No more brains for {0} to suck! The beasts decided to kill one of their own. I don't think they knew what they were doing....\nAnyway, the Brain Sucker is dead.
It seems that the beasts were annoyed by {0}'s sucking. The Brainsucker is found shredded in a street corner. Too bad. Not that the hunters care.
The hunter were hunted last night! {0}, the Vengeful Hunter, is found ripped apart, limb by limb. The beasts have no use for despicable and petty hunters. {0} is dead, of course.

There is a strange trail of crow feathers. The hunters follow them, and are greeted with a terrible sight!\n{0} tried to hunt the wrong person last night. There is only Eileen's head resting in the middle of a pool of blood. The rest of the body is missing, it's clear that Iosefka seeks more power to hunt **YOU**!

A faint smell of bad blood is in the air. The hunters follow it, only to find a corpse with crazed eyes staring at the sky.\n{0} was a corrupted hunter, and had bad luck: the beasts stayed in their lair this night. {0} thought it would be a good idea to corrupt them... Eileen's job becomes easier and easier.
Ain't this bad luck? Or maybe just silliness? {0}, a corrupted hunter, though it would be a good idea to corrupt a beast! If only they knew...\nOne less on Eileen's list. {0} is dead. (of course)

Last night, the crazed-corrupted hunters tried to convert the one person in the village crazier than they are. It seems that Iosefka enjoyed the visit, since that there is no sign of {0} anymore. Well, no one will ever hear from {0} again. Iosefka sends her regards.
The Good Hunter followed the wrong call! When {0} got there, {0} only found Iosefka waiting from them.\nNo one heard a thing. And no one will ever hear from {0} again.

Shots being fired, smashing sounds! All the hunters head to where the fight is happening.\nThey get there in time just to see Iosefka running away. It's a shame no one saw her face... The hunters aren't able to help {0}. Your Good Hunter is now dead.
{0} tried to help a beast last night. Scattered through the main city square are some of {0}'s belongings. No one seems to find the body, it seems that the beasts feasted on {0}!

Something seems off. {0} is nowhere to be found! When the hunters finally get to the Good Hunter's bell, they find {0}'s corpse thrown over it. It is clear that the Good Hunter tried to help the wrong person last night! {0} is dead.
The beasts get ready for the night, and didn't expect help to come... In form of a hunter?!\n{0} tries to transform into a beast, but their body isn't strong enough, and {0} dies in the process.
The covenant of crazed hunters sends {0} to try to corrupt {1}. No one will never hear about {0} again. Iosefka has made another victim with her experiments.

{0} goes over to corrupt {1}. You don't know what happened, but the last thing you hear is Iosefka's voice: "Shall we begin the experiments?"\nYou sent him to Iosefka's clinic! {0} is now dead from her experiments.

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} tried to kill {0}. The beast didn't expect Gherman to be so resilient!\n0}’s scythe was too sharp and too quick. In less than one minute, {1}'s head is sent flying in the air. The last Beast is dead, and Gherman can rest in peace, **nightmare slain**.

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} went to kill {0}. When {1} gets there, they find Gherman taking a nap on their wheelchair, even sleep talking! The Beast had no mercy, and the First and last hunter is now dead.

{1} and {0} walk out in daylight. No use in trying to hide, {0} leaps towards {1}.\nEileen, the Crow smiles behind her crow mask, and ready her blades. It was quick and painless for {0}. Eileen hunted down the last of them. Great job!
Join time extended by {0} seconds!\n{1} left to hit the button. The hunt MUST happen!
Join time decreased by {0} seconds!\n{1} left to use the button. Slow hunters take no part in the hunt.
Only the Great Ones can extend the time more than once! Stop that humiliating behavior.

As the sun starts to shine on the village, {0} wakes to the sound of silence. Realising there was no one left, the goal is accomplished.
{0}'s nurse took care of everything. They now can enjoy a peaceful sleep.

{0} opens their eyes, but instead of hearing the usual bustle of the hunt, they are met with silence. They stare at the dreary ceiling, letting reality slowly sink in. Everyone was dead. The wolves were dead. With a pang in their heart, {0} gets up,and slips into the darkness of the forest, in an eternal chase for real Insight.
